椗字的基本解释

椗
dìng
同“碇”。

椗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dìng］
(1)木垫。
(2)同“碇”。系船的石礅或铁锚。
(3)引申为下碇，停泊。
(4)见“椗花”。

椗字的起名意思

木垫；同"碇"。系船的石礅或铁锚；引申为下碇，停泊。

anchor
Basic explanation of words
anchor
dìng
Same as "Ink".
anchor
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dìng］
(1) Wooden mat.
(2) Same as "碇". A stone or iron anchor to moor a ship.
(3) The extension is the lower anchorage, anchoring.
(4) See "Ink Flower".
